game.name: 404: Game Not Found
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: 404: Game Not Found (GNF) is a rage-bait puzzle game packed with trick questions, puns, riddles and minigames. You’ll face a series of questions ranging from logical to nonsensical rubbish.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 404: Game Not Found (GNF) is a rage-bait puzzle game packed with trick questions, puns, riddles and minigames. You’ll face a series of questions ranging from logical to nonsensical rubbish.
